docs.lead_paragraph: A study found that a CT scan could ascertain the heart health of people over 40 to better help them make a decision on taking cholesterol-lowering statins.

headline.main: Heart Scan Can Fine-Tune Risk Estimate for Patients Considering Statins
headline.print_headline: Heart Scan Can Fine-Tune the Risk Estimate for Patients Considering Statins

docs.abstract: Study published in Journal of the American College of Cardiology finds that inexpensive CT scans that look for calcium in coronary arteries are effective in helping patients make decision on whether to take cholesterol-lowering statins to reduce heart attack risk.
docs.snippet: A study found that a CT scan could ascertain the heart health of people over 40 to better help them make a decision on taking cholesterol-lowering statins.

keywords.value: Journal of the American College of Cardiology
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: The city that was once the epidemic’s ground zero now has only a few hundred new cases a year, the result of a raft of creative programs.

headline.main: San Francisco Is Changing Face of AIDS Treatment

docs.abstract: San Francisco has drastically reduced HIV infection rates through series of innovative programs, turning city that was once ground zero for disease into example for rest of country; city had 302 new infections in 2014, down from 2,332 at epidemic's peak.
docs.snippet: The city that was once the epidemic’s ground zero now has only a few hundred new cases a year, the result of a raft of creative programs.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United Auto Workers and Fiat Chrysler Automobiles NV negotiators were back at the table on Monday days after U.S. union members soundly rejected a proposed four-year contract the two sides agreed on three weeks ago.

headline.main: Chiropractic Care Grows, and Gains Acceptance

docs.abstract: More and more doctors agree that such treatment can help ease back pain, and while all doubts have not been swept away, the author gave it a try.

headline.main: The Hurdles to Getting Hearing Aids
headline.print_headline: The Hurdles to Treating Hearing Loss

docs.abstract: Hearing loss is usually gradual, and people often fail to recognize when it becomes severe enough to warrant hearing aids.
docs.snippet: Hearing loss is usually gradual, and people often fail to recognize when it becomes severe enough to warrant hearing aids.

docs.lead_paragraph: A pharmaceutical company buys old drugs and increases the price multifold, a profitable business model that is drawing anger and making the traditional drug industry nervous.

headline.main: Valeant’s Drug Price Strategy Enriches It, but Infuriates Patients and Lawmakers
headline.print_headline: A Drug Company’s Price Tactics Pinch Insurers and Consumers

docs.abstract: Valeant Pharmaceuticals International has outperformed its rivals in industry due in large part to executive J Michael Pearson's aggressive practice of buying up existing drugs and then raising prices on them significantly, but tactic has drawn ire of consumers and attention of regulators; focus of regulators has many in industry worried, as many companies employ similar tactic, though not to extreme Valeant does.
docs.snippet: A pharmaceutical company buys old drugs and increases the price multifold, a profitable business model that is drawing anger and making the traditional drug industry nervous.
